title: MIT ADT University to offer Post Graduate Diploma in Data Science
summary: MIT Centre for Future Skills Excellence at MIT Art, Design and Technology University has partnered with AI Beehive to launch a Post Graduate Diploma program in Data Science.
content: MIT Art, Design and Technology University has announced a collaboration with AI Beehive to offer a Post Graduate Diploma in Data Science. The program will be run through the MIT Centre for Future Skills Excellence, aiming to provide advanced education in the growing field of data science. This partnership represents a significant step in expanding educational opportunities in technology and data analytics at the graduate level.

source.title: MIT ADT University to offer Post Graduate Diploma in Data Science
source.content:
MIT ADT University to offer Post Graduate Diploma in Data Science
PUNE, India, Dec. 24, 2021 /PRNewswire/ — MIT Centre for Future Skills Excellence, MIT Art, Design and Technology University teams up with AI Beehive to jointly run the Post Graduate D... [7807 chars]

markdown_content:
MIT Art, Design and Technology University has announced a collaboration with AI Beehive to offer a Post Graduate Diploma in Data Science. The program will be run through the MIT Centre for Future Skills Excellence, aiming to provide advanced education in the growing field of data science.

This partnership represents a significant step in expanding educational opportunities in technology and data analytics at the graduate level.
[note: no special markdown formatting needed as this is a simple news announcement without sections, quotes, or lists]
